Sergeant Steelwill is one of the three sergeants found guarding General Graardor in the Bandos section of the God Wars Dungeon, along with Sergeant Strongstack and Sergeant Grimspike. Though Steelwill wields a hammer, he uses magic instead of melee.

Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch
Bones1Always1641

Main drop[edit | edit source]

All bodyguards have a 1/128 chance to roll on to the "bodyguard unique" table, which includes all rare items unique to each faction except godsword shards (which are not unique), godsword hilts (which are only dropped by each faction's general) and Warpriest armour pieces (which can be dropped by all monsters in the same faction). Then, for Bandos bodyguards, each unique has a 1/384 chance to drop. If no uniques are rolled, then 1,000-1,500 coins will be dropped instead.[d 1]

  1. ^ a b c d e f The chance of rolling a Warpriest of Bandos armour drop is 1/128, and the chance of getting a particular piece of armour is 1/768. As each piece can only be obtained once, the chance for a single piece increases as they are obtained.
  2. ^ This drop only attempts to roll should you fail to roll a hard clue, should you get this item, there's a 1% chance it'll be upgraded to a sealed clue scroll (master).

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.

  • Concept art for the upgraded Sergeant Steelwill, alongside his fellow sergeants.

Graphical updates[edit | edit source]

  • Sergeant Steelwill after 28 August 2007 (update)

  • Sergeant Steelwill after 1 July 2008 (update)

  • Sergeant Steelwill after 5 September 2012 (update)

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • update 5 September 2012 (Update):
    • Sergeant Steelwill has been graphically updated.
  • update 28 August 2007 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Before Steelwill's graphical update, he had a mohawk and a flail that shot magic projectiles at enemies, and had a unique death animation along with his fellow bodyguards. After the update, he now has a hammer. Along with the graphical update, his death animation is similar to that of a goblin.
  • Although the examine text says "A battle-honed goblin", Sergeant Steelwill, along with his fellow bodyguards, have slightly lower health then the goblins fighting Zamorak's forces outside.
